name: MiniMine (LavkaDarmoeda)
description:
It’s a simple, small, endless game where you’re going as a weird character named --dig resources and then sell them to make money.

And to make more money, you can melt down the mined ore and sell the resulting ingots.

If there is nothing left in the mine, it means that the working day has come to an end and you need to go to sleep.

EARN AS MUCH MONEY AS YOU CAN TO BECOME THE RICHEST IN THE WORLD

(or just waste time)
